Module io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format

Interface PatternRegistry

public sealed interface PatternRegistry
Pattern registry to register custom keywords.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Builtin supported color pattern keys.

  • Method Details

    • getOrNull

      @Nullable FormatterFactory getOrNull(String key)
      Gets the formatter factory for the pattern key.
      Parameters:
      key - keyword.
      Returns:
      factory or null.

    • register

      void register(PatternRegistry.PatternKey key, FormatterFactory factory)
      Registers a pattern key with a formatter factory. You may replace the builtin pattern formatters with PatternRegistry.KeywordKey or PatternRegistry.ColorKeys or create a new key with PatternRegistry.PatternKey.of(String).
      Parameters:
      key - pattern keys.
      factory - factory to create formatters from pattern keywords.

    • keyword

      default void keyword(PatternRegistry.PatternKey key, FormatterFactory.KeywordFactory factory)
      Convenience function for register(PatternKey, FormatterFactory) as keyword factory is a lambda.
      Parameters:
      key - pattern keys.
      factory - factory create formatter from a simple keyword.

    • of

      static PatternRegistry of()
      Creates a pattern registry with the defaults.
      Returns:
      default registry.
